General.Name: Datacolor AG
General.Description: Datacolor AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions for color measurement, management, communication, and calibration in Europe, the Americas, and the Asia Pacific. It offers benchtop and portable spectrophotometers; color management software; color lab dispensing system, lab dying machine, lightbox color evaluation tool, and color sample conditioning; and color audit services. It serves the textile and apparel, paint, coatings, dye and plastics, and consumer market industries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Rotkreuz, Switzerland.
